name: Black Holes Escape
description:
You are stuck at the center of the universe with countless black holes, how long can you survive?


Made for the Mini Jam 67: Void

How to play

WASD - Move

The outer part of the black holes will try to pull you in, the inner part will kill you and end the game!

Difficulty increases every 15 secs.

Authors

Programming: Pascal Boardman (Protosev) Twitter

Arts: Marianne Richard Instagram

Source Code

Made with Godot! Source code is available here on Github
